bibl.title: Theos Hypsistos in the Papyri.
Akten des 23. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses. Wien, 22.-28. Juli 2001

series.title: Österreichische Akademie der Wissenschaften. Philosophisch-historische Klasse. Kommission für antike Rechtsgeschichte. Papyrologica Vindobonensia.

bibl.note: "The cult of the Highest God, theos hypsistos, was widespread in the eastern Mediterranean. Yet in Egypt after the beginning of the second century C.E. there is no evidence for this cult, and the phrase theos hypsistos does not appear in documentary papyri until the fourth century. Why?"
